Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

15 using namespace std;
16 using namespace katrin;
17 using namespace Kassiopeia;
18 
19 typedef vector< pair< string, TTree* > > DataTreeVector;
20 
21 struct Trees {
22  TTree *tRunTree;
23  TTree *tEventTree;
24  TTree *tTrackTree;
25  TTree *tStepTree;
26 
27  TTree *tRunKeysTree;
28  TTree *tEventKeysTree;
29  TTree *tTrackKeysTree;
30  TTree *tStepKeysTree;
31 };
32 
33 struct Indices {
34  unsigned int tRunIndex;
35  unsigned int tRunFirstEvent;
36  unsigned int tRunLastEvent;
37  unsigned int tRunFirstTrack;
38  unsigned int tRunLastTrack;
39  unsigned int tRunFirstStep;
40  unsigned int tRunLastStep;
41  unsigned int tEventIndex;
42  unsigned int tEventFirstTrack;
43  unsigned int tEventLastTrack;
44  unsigned int tEventFirstStep;
45  unsigned int tEventLastStep;
46  unsigned int tTrackIndex;
47  unsigned int tTrackFirstStep;
48  unsigned int tTrackLastStep;
49  unsigned int tStepIndex;
50 };
51 
52 struct DataMap {
53 
54  DataMap() :
55  tStructureLabelPointer( &tStructureLabel ),
56  tStructureLabelHandle( &tStructureLabelPointer ),
57  tStructureTypePointer( &tStructureType ),
58  tStructureTypeHandle( &tStructureTypePointer ),
59  tPresenceIndex( 0 ),
60  tPresenceIndexPointer( &tPresenceIndex ),
61  tPresenceLength( 0 ),
62  tPresenceLengthPointer( &tPresenceLength )
63  {
64  }
65 
66  string tStructureLabel;
67  string *tStructureLabelPointer;
68  string **tStructureLabelHandle;
69  string tStructureType;
70  string *tStructureTypePointer;
71  string **tStructureTypeHandle;
72  unsigned int tPresenceIndex;
73  unsigned int *tPresenceIndexPointer;
74  unsigned int tPresenceLength;
75  unsigned int *tPresenceLengthPointer;
76  map< string, Bool_t > tBoolMap;
77  map< string, UChar_t > tUCharMap;
78  map< string, Char_t > tCharMap;
79  map< string, UShort_t > tUShortMap;
80  map< string, Short_t > tShortMap;
81  map< string, UInt_t > tUIntMap;
82  map< string, Int_t > tIntMap;
83  map< string, ULong64_t > tULongMap;
84  map< string, Long64_t > tLongMap;
85  map< string, Float_t > tFloatMap;
86  map< string, Double_t > tDoubleMap;
87  map< string, string > tStringMap;
88  map< string, string* > tStringPointerMap;
89  map< string, Double_t > tTwoVectorXMap;
90  map< string, Double_t > tTwoVectorYMap;
91  map< string, Double_t > tThreeVectorXMap;
92  map< string, Double_t > tThreeVectorYMap;
93  map< string, Double_t > tThreeVectorZMap;
94 };

96 //function declarations
97 TTree* GetTree( KRootFile *tInputRootFile, TString tName );
98 void CheckLabel( KRootFile *tInputRootFile );
99 void GetIndicesBranchAddresses( Trees *tTrees, Indices *tIndices );
100 void GetDataTrees( KRootFile *tInputFile, TTree *tKeyTree, DataTreeVector *tDataTreeVector, bool first );
101 void GetDataBranches( TTree *tStructureTree, TTree *tPresenceTree, TTree *tDataTree, DataMap *tDataMap );
102 void WriteIndexTrees( KRootFile *tRootFile, Trees *tTrees, Indices *tIndices, const int tBufferSize, const int tSplitSize );
103 void WriteDataTrees( KRootFile *tRootFile, DataTreeVector *tOutputDataTreeVector, DataTreeVector *tDataTreeVector );
104 void WriteDataBranches( TTree *tStructureTree, TTree *tPresenceTree, TTree *tDataTree, DataMap *tDataMap, const int tBufferSize, const int tSplitSize );
105 void FillDataStructureBranch( TTree *tOutputStructureTree, TTree *tInputStructureTree );
106 void GetWriteFillKeyTrees( KRootFile *tRootFile, Trees *tInputTrees, Trees *tOutputTrees, const int tBufferSize, const int tSplitSize );
107 void FillIndexTrees( Trees *tOutputTrees, Trees *tInputTrees, Indices *tIndices );
108 void FillDataBranches( TTree *tOutputDataTree, TTree *tInputDataTree );
109 void FillDataPresenceBranch( TTree *tOutputDataPresenceTree, TTree *tInputDataPresenceTree, DataMap *tDataMap );

111 
112 int main( int argc, char** argv )
113 {
114  KMessageTable::GetInstance().SetTerminalVerbosity( eNormal );
115  KMessageTable::GetInstance().SetLogVerbosity( eNormal );
116 
117  const int tBufferSize = 64000;
118  const int tSplitSize = 99;
119 
120  if( argc < 4 )
121  {
122  cout << "usage: ./ROOTFileMerge <input_file_1> <input_file_2> [<input_file_3> <...>] <output_file>" << endl;
123  exit( -1 );
124  }
125  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "Analyzing " << argc - 2 << " files" << eom;
126 
127  Trees *tInputTrees = new Trees();
128  Trees *tOutputTrees = new Trees();
129 
130  Indices *tIndices = new Indices();
131 
132  DataTreeVector *tRunDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
133  DataTreeVector *tEventDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
134  DataTreeVector *tTrackDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
135  DataTreeVector *tStepDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
136  DataTreeVector *tOutputRunDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
137  DataTreeVector *tOutputEventDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
138  DataTreeVector *tOutputTrackDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
139  DataTreeVector *tOutputStepDataTrees = new DataTreeVector();
140 
141  //maps for data
142  vector< DataMap * > tRunDataMapVector;
143  vector< DataMap * > tEventDataMapVector;
144  vector< DataMap * > tTrackDataMapVector;
145  vector< DataMap * > tStepDataMapVector;
146 
147  //save number of indices in each data output
148  vector< unsigned int > tNumRunDataEntries;
149  vector< unsigned int > tNumEventDataEntries;
150  vector< unsigned int > tNumTrackDataEntries;
151  vector< unsigned int > tNumStepDataEntries;
152 
153  KRootFile* tInputRootFile;
154  string tInputname;
155 
156  //make output file
157  KRootFile* tOutputRootFile = new KRootFile();
158  string tOutputname( argv[argc-1] );
159 
160  //make the output file '.root'
161  if( tOutputname.length() < 5 || tOutputname.substr( tOutputname.length()-5, tOutputname.length()-1 ) != ".root")
162  {
163  tOutputname+=string(".root");
164  }
165  tOutputRootFile->AddToNames( tOutputname );
166 
167  if( tOutputRootFile->Open( KFile::eWrite ) == false )
168  {
169  mainmsg( eError ) << "Could not make file: <" << tOutputname << "> Exiting..." << eom;
170  exit( -1 );
171  }
172 
173  //set kassiopeia label for output file
174  TObjString* fLabel = new TObjString( string( "KASSIOPEIA_TREE_DATA" ).c_str() );
175  fLabel->Write( "LABEL", TObject::kOverwrite );
176  TTree::SetBranchStyle( 1 );
177 
178 
179  //loop over all input files
180  for( int i = 0; i < argc - 2; ++i )
181  {
182  tInputRootFile = new KRootFile();
183  tInputname = argv[i+1];
184  tInputRootFile->AddToNames( tInputname );
185  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "Analyzing file " << i+1 << " of " << argc - 2 << ": <" << tInputname << ">" << eom;
186 
187  //read input file
188  if( tInputRootFile->Open( KFile::eRead ) == false )
189  {
190  mainmsg( eError ) << "Could not read file: <" << tInputname << ">. Exiting..." << eom;
191  exit( -1 );
192  }
193 
194  //check input file for kassiopeia label
195  CheckLabel( tInputRootFile );
196 
197  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "Getting indices and key trees..." << eom;
198  //get all index and key trees included in any kassiopeia root file
199  tInputTrees->tRunTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "RUN_DATA" );
200  tInputTrees->tEventTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "EVENT_DATA" );
201  tInputTrees->tTrackTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "TRACK_DATA" );
202  tInputTrees->tStepTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "STEP_DATA" );
203  tInputTrees->tRunKeysTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "RUN_KEYS" );
204  tInputTrees->tEventKeysTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "EVENT_KEYS" );
205  tInputTrees->tTrackKeysTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "TRACK_KEYS" );
206  tInputTrees->tStepKeysTree = GetTree( tInputRootFile, "STEP_KEYS" );
207 
208  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "GetIndicesBranchAddresses..." << eom;
209  //set all local addresses to the addresses in the input file
210  GetIndicesBranchAddresses( tInputTrees, tIndices );
211 
212  //create basic output tree structures after reading the first file
213  if( i == 0 )
214  {
215  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "Getting all data trees..." << eom;
216  //get all data trees which may be included in the input file
217  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tRunKeysTree, tRunDataTrees, true );
218  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tEventKeysTree, tEventDataTrees, true );
219  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tTrackKeysTree, tTrackDataTrees, true );
220  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tStepKeysTree, tStepDataTrees, true );
221 
222  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "Getting all data branches..." << eom;
223  //get all data branches in any data trees found before
224  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tRunDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tRunDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
225  {
226  tRunDataMapVector.push_back( new DataMap() );
227  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tRunDataMapVector.back() );
228  }
229  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tEventDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tEventDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
230  {
231  tEventDataMapVector.push_back( new DataMap() );
232  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tEventDataMapVector.back() );
233  }
234  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tTrackDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tTrackDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
235  {
236  tTrackDataMapVector.push_back( new DataMap() );
237  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tTrackDataMapVector.back() );
238  }
239  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tStepDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tStepDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
240  {
241  tStepDataMapVector.push_back( new DataMap() );
242  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tStepDataMapVector.back() );
243  }
244 
245  //initialize numlength variables
246  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tRunDataMapVector.size(); ++tI )
247  {
248  tNumRunDataEntries.push_back( 0 );
249  }
250  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tEventDataMapVector.size(); ++tI )
251  {
252  tNumEventDataEntries.push_back( 0 );
253  }
254  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tTrackDataMapVector.size(); ++tI )
255  {
256  tNumTrackDataEntries.push_back( 0 );
257  }
258  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tStepDataMapVector.size(); ++tI )
259  {
260  tNumStepDataEntries.push_back( 0 );
261  }
262 
263  //write the tree structure into the output file
264  WriteIndexTrees( tOutputRootFile, tOutputTrees, tIndices, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
265 
266  //get, write and fill the key trees
267  GetWriteFillKeyTrees( tOutputRootFile, tInputTrees, tOutputTrees, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
268 
269  //write all data trees which may be included in the input file
270  WriteDataTrees( tOutputRootFile, tOutputRunDataTrees, tRunDataTrees );
271  WriteDataTrees( tOutputRootFile, tOutputEventDataTrees, tEventDataTrees );
272  WriteDataTrees( tOutputRootFile, tOutputTrackDataTrees, tTrackDataTrees );
273  WriteDataTrees( tOutputRootFile, tOutputStepDataTrees, tStepDataTrees );
274 
275  //write all data branches in any data trees
276  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputRunDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
277  {
278  WriteDataBranches( tOutputRunDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tOutputRunDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tOutputRunDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tRunDataMapVector[tI/3], tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
279  FillDataStructureBranch( tOutputRunDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tRunDataTrees->at( tI ).second );
280  }
281  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputEventDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
282  {
283  WriteDataBranches( tOutputEventDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tOutputEventDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tOutputEventDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tEventDataMapVector[tI/3], tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
284  FillDataStructureBranch( tOutputEventDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tEventDataTrees->at( tI ).second );
285  }
286  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputTrackDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
287  {
288  WriteDataBranches( tOutputTrackDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tOutputTrackDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tOutputTrackDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tTrackDataMapVector[tI/3], tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
289  FillDataStructureBranch( tOutputTrackDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tTrackDataTrees->at( tI ).second );
290  }
291  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputStepDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
292  {
293  WriteDataBranches( tOutputStepDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tOutputStepDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tOutputStepDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tStepDataMapVector[tI/3], tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
294  FillDataStructureBranch( tOutputStepDataTrees->at( tI ).second, tStepDataTrees->at( tI ).second );
295  }
296  }
297  else
298  {
299  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "Getting all data trees..." << eom;
300  //get all data trees which may be included in the input file
301  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tRunKeysTree, tRunDataTrees, false );
302  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tEventKeysTree, tEventDataTrees, false );
303  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tTrackKeysTree, tTrackDataTrees, false );
304  GetDataTrees( tInputRootFile, tInputTrees->tStepKeysTree, tStepDataTrees, false );
305 
306  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "Getting all data branches..." << eom;
307  //get all data branches in any data trees found before
308  unsigned int tIndex = 0;
309  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tRunDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tRunDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
310  {
311  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tRunDataMapVector.at(tIndex) );
312  ++tIndex;
313  }
314  tIndex = 0;
315  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tEventDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tEventDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
316  {
317  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tEventDataMapVector.at(tIndex) );
318  ++tIndex;
319  }
320  tIndex = 0;
321  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tTrackDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tTrackDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
322  {
323  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tTrackDataMapVector.at(tIndex) );
324  ++tIndex;
325  }
326  tIndex = 0;
327  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tStepDataTrees->begin(); tIt != tStepDataTrees->end(); tIt += 3 )
328  {
329  GetDataBranches( (*tIt).second, (*(tIt+1)).second, (*(tIt+2)).second, tStepDataMapVector.at(tIndex) );
330  ++tIndex;
331  }
332  }
333 
334  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "FillIndexTrees..." << eom;
335  //put new index data in the combined output file
336  FillIndexTrees( tOutputTrees, tInputTrees, tIndices );
337 
338  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "FillDataBranches..." << eom;
339  //fill data branches in the combined output file
340  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputRunDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
341  {
342  FillDataPresenceBranch( tOutputRunDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tRunDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tRunDataMapVector.at( tI/3 ) );
343  FillDataBranches( tOutputRunDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tRunDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second );
344  }
345  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputEventDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
346  {
347  FillDataPresenceBranch( tOutputEventDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tEventDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tEventDataMapVector.at( tI/3 ) );
348  FillDataBranches( tOutputEventDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tEventDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second );
349  }
350  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputTrackDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
351  {
352  FillDataPresenceBranch( tOutputTrackDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tTrackDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tTrackDataMapVector.at( tI/3 ) );
353  FillDataBranches( tOutputTrackDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tTrackDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second );
354  }
355  for( unsigned int tI = 0; tI < tOutputStepDataTrees->size(); tI += 3 )
356  {
357  FillDataPresenceBranch( tOutputStepDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tStepDataTrees->at( tI+1 ).second, tStepDataMapVector.at( tI/3 ) );
358  FillDataBranches( tOutputStepDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second, tStepDataTrees->at( tI+2 ).second );
359  }
360 
361  //close file and delete file pointer before analyzing next file
362  tInputRootFile->Close();
363  delete tInputRootFile;
364  }
365 
366  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "Writing file: <" << tOutputname << ">. This can take a while..." << eom;
367 
368  tOutputRootFile->File()->Write( "", TObject::kOverwrite );
369  tOutputRootFile->Close();
370 
371  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "Wrote file: <" << tOutputname << ">" << eom;
372  mainmsg( eNormal ) << "Merge completed. Exiting..." << eom;
373 }
374 
375 
376 TTree* GetTree( KRootFile *tInputRootFile, TString tName )
377 {
378  TTree *tTree = (TTree*) (tInputRootFile->File()->Get( tName ) );
379  if( !tTree )
380  {
381  mainmsg( eError ) << "File <" << tInputRootFile->GetName() << "> has no Tree " << tName << ". Exiting..." << eom;
382  exit( -1 );
383  }
384  return tTree;
385 }
386 
387 void CheckLabel( KRootFile *tInputRootFile )
388 {
389  TObjString *tLabel = (TObjString*) (tInputRootFile->File()->Get( "LABEL" ));
390  if( !tLabel )
391  {
392  mainmsg( eError ) << "File <" << tInputRootFile->GetName() << "> has no LABEL. Probably not a Kassiopeia file. Exiting..." << eom;
393  exit( -1 );
394  }
395 
396  if( tLabel->GetString().CompareTo( string( "KASSIOPEIA_TREE_DATA" ).c_str() ) != 0 )
397  {
398  mainmsg( eError ) << "File's <" << tInputRootFile->GetName() << "> LABEL is not 'KASSIOPEIA_TREE_DATA'. Probably not a Kassiopeia File. Exiting..." << eom;
399  exit( -1 );
400  }
401 }
402 
403 void GetIndicesBranchAddresses( Trees *tTrees, Indices *tIndices )
404 {
405  tTrees->tRunTree->SetBranchAddress( "RUN_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunIndex) );
406  tTrees->tRunTree->SetBranchAddress( "FIRST_EVENT_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunFirstEvent) );
407  tTrees->tRunTree->SetBranchAddress( "LAST_EVENT_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunLastEvent) );
408  tTrees->tRunTree->SetBranchAddress( "FIRST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunFirstTrack) );
409  tTrees->tRunTree->SetBranchAddress( "LAST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunLastTrack) );
410  tTrees->tRunTree->SetBranchAddress( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunFirstStep) );
411  tTrees->tRunTree->SetBranchAddress( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunLastStep) );
412 
413  tTrees->tEventTree->SetBranchAddress( "EVENT_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventIndex) );
414  tTrees->tEventTree->SetBranchAddress( "FIRST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventFirstTrack) );
415  tTrees->tEventTree->SetBranchAddress( "LAST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventLastTrack) );
416  tTrees->tEventTree->SetBranchAddress( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventFirstStep) );
417  tTrees->tEventTree->SetBranchAddress( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventLastStep) );
418 
419  tTrees->tTrackTree->SetBranchAddress( "TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tTrackIndex) );
420  tTrees->tTrackTree->SetBranchAddress( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tTrackFirstStep ) );
421  tTrees->tTrackTree->SetBranchAddress( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tTrackLastStep) );
422 
423  tTrees->tStepTree->SetBranchAddress( "STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tStepIndex) );
424 }
425 
426 void GetDataTrees( KRootFile *tInputFile, TTree *tKeyTree, DataTreeVector *tDataTreeVector, bool first )
427 {
428  string tKey;
429  string* tKeyPointer = &tKey;
430  string** tKeyHandle = &tKeyPointer;
431  string tDataTreeName;
432 
433  tKeyTree->SetBranchAddress( "KEY", tKeyHandle );
434  for( Long64_t tKeyIndex = 0; tKeyIndex < tKeyTree->GetEntries(); tKeyIndex++ )
435  {
436  tKeyTree->GetEntry( tKeyIndex );
437 
438  tDataTreeName = tKey + string( "_STRUCTURE" );
439  if( first )
440  tDataTreeVector->push_back( make_pair( tDataTreeName, ( TTree * ) tInputFile->File()->Get( tDataTreeName.c_str() ) ) );
441  else
442  tDataTreeVector->at(3*tKeyIndex) = ( make_pair( tDataTreeName, ( TTree * ) tInputFile->File()->Get( tDataTreeName.c_str() ) ) );
443 
444  tDataTreeName = tKey + string( "_PRESENCE" );
445  if( first )
446  tDataTreeVector->push_back( make_pair( tDataTreeName, ( TTree * ) tInputFile->File()->Get( tDataTreeName.c_str() ) ) );
447  else
448  tDataTreeVector->at((3*tKeyIndex)+1) = ( make_pair( tDataTreeName, ( TTree * ) tInputFile->File()->Get( tDataTreeName.c_str() ) ) );
449 
450  tDataTreeName = tKey + string( "_DATA" );
451  if( first )
452  tDataTreeVector->push_back( make_pair( tDataTreeName, ( TTree * ) tInputFile->File()->Get( tDataTreeName.c_str() ) ) );
453  else
454  tDataTreeVector->at((3*tKeyIndex)+2) = ( make_pair( tDataTreeName, ( TTree * ) tInputFile->File()->Get( tDataTreeName.c_str() ) ) );
455  }
456 }
457 
458 void GetDataBranches( TTree *tStructureTree, TTree *tPresenceTree, TTree *tDataTree, DataMap *tDataMap )
459 {
460  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "StructureTree: " << tStructureTree->GetName() << eom;
461  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "PresenceTree: " << tPresenceTree->GetName() << eom;
462  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "DataTree: " << tDataTree->GetName() << eom;
463  tStructureTree->SetBranchAddress( "LABEL", tDataMap->tStructureLabelHandle );
464  tStructureTree->SetBranchAddress( "TYPE", tDataMap->tStructureTypeHandle );
465 
466  for( Long64_t tStructureIndex = 0; tStructureIndex < tStructureTree->GetEntries(); tStructureIndex++ )
467  {
468  tStructureTree->GetEntry( tStructureIndex );
469  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "analyzing structure with label <" << tDataMap->tStructureLabel << "> and type <" << tDataMap->tStructureType << ">" << eom;
470 
471  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "bool" ) )
472  {
473  Bool_t &tBool = tDataMap->tBoolMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
474  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tBool );
475  continue;
476  }
477  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "unsigned_char" ) )
478  {
479  UChar_t &tUChar = tDataMap->tUCharMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
480  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tUChar );
481  continue;
482  }
483  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "char" ) )
484  {
485  Char_t &tChar = tDataMap->tCharMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
486  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tChar );
487  continue;
488  }
489  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "unsigned_short" ) )
490  {
491  UShort_t &tUShort = tDataMap->tUShortMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
492  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tUShort );
493  continue;
494  }
495  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "short" ) )
496  {
497  Short_t &tShort = tDataMap->tShortMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
498  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tShort );
499  continue;
500  }
501  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "unsigned_int" ) )
502  {
503  UInt_t &tUInt = tDataMap->tUIntMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
504  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tUInt );
505  continue;
506  }
507  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "int" ) )
508  {
509  Int_t &tInt = tDataMap->tIntMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
510  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tInt );
511  continue;
512  }
513  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "unsigned_long" ) )
514  {
515  ULong64_t &tULong = tDataMap->tULongMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
516  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tULong );
517  continue;
518  }
519  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "long" ) )
520  {
521  Long64_t &tLong = tDataMap->tLongMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
522  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tLong );
523  continue;
524  }
525  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "float" ) )
526  {
527  Float_t &tFloat = tDataMap->tFloatMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
528  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tFloat );
529  continue;
530  }
531  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "double" ) )
532  {
533  Double_t &tDouble = tDataMap->tDoubleMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
534  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tDouble );
535  continue;
536  }
537  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "string" ) )
538  {
539  string &tString = tDataMap->tStringMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
540  string* &tStringPointer = tDataMap->tStringPointerMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel ];
541  tStringPointer = &tString;
542  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( tDataMap->tStructureLabel.c_str(), &tStringPointer );
543  continue;
544  }
545  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "two_vector" ) )
546  {
547  Double_t &tDoubleX = tDataMap->tTwoVectorXMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_x" ) ];
548  Double_t &tDoubleY = tDataMap->tTwoVectorYMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_y" ) ];
549  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( ( tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_x" ) ).c_str(), &tDoubleX );
550  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( ( tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_y" ) ).c_str(), &tDoubleY );
551  continue;
552  }
553  if( tDataMap->tStructureType == string( "three_vector" ) )
554  {
555  Double_t &tDoubleX = tDataMap->tThreeVectorXMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_x" ) ];
556  Double_t &tDoubleY = tDataMap->tThreeVectorYMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_y" ) ];
557  Double_t &tDoubleZ = tDataMap->tThreeVectorZMap[ tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_z" ) ];
558  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( ( tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_x" ) ).c_str(), &tDoubleX );
559  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( ( tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_y" ) ).c_str(), &tDoubleY );
560  tDataTree->SetBranchAddress( ( tDataMap->tStructureLabel + string( "_z" ) ).c_str(), &tDoubleZ );
561  continue;
562  }
563 
564  mainmsg( eError ) << "could not analyze branch with label <" << tDataMap->tStructureLabel << "> and type <" << tDataMap->tStructureType << ">. Exiting..." << eom;
565  exit( -1 );
566  }
567 
568  tPresenceTree->SetBranchAddress( "INDEX", tDataMap->tPresenceIndexPointer );
569  tPresenceTree->SetBranchAddress( "LENGTH", tDataMap->tPresenceLengthPointer );
570  tPresenceTree->GetEntry( 0 );
571 }
572 
573 void WriteIndexTrees( KRootFile *tRootFile, Trees *tTrees, Indices *tIndices, const int tBufferSize, const int tSplitSize )
574 {
575  tTrees->tRunTree = new TTree( "RUN_DATA", "RUN_DATA" );
576  tTrees->tRunTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
577  tTrees->tRunTree->Branch( "RUN_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunIndex), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
578  tTrees->tRunTree->Branch( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunFirstStep), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
579  tTrees->tRunTree->Branch( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunLastStep), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
580  tTrees->tRunTree->Branch( "FIRST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunFirstTrack), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
581  tTrees->tRunTree->Branch( "LAST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunLastTrack), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
582  tTrees->tRunTree->Branch( "FIRST_EVENT_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunFirstEvent), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
583  tTrees->tRunTree->Branch( "LAST_EVENT_INDEX", &(tIndices->tRunLastEvent), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
584 
585  tTrees->tEventTree = new TTree( "EVENT_DATA", "EVENT_DATA" );
586  tTrees->tEventTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
587  tTrees->tEventTree->Branch( "EVENT_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventIndex), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
588  tTrees->tEventTree->Branch( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventFirstStep), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
589  tTrees->tEventTree->Branch( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventLastStep), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
590  tTrees->tEventTree->Branch( "FIRST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventFirstTrack), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
591  tTrees->tEventTree->Branch( "LAST_TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tEventLastTrack), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
592 
593  tTrees->tTrackTree = new TTree( "TRACK_DATA", "TRACK_DATA" );
594  tTrees->tTrackTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
595  tTrees->tTrackTree->Branch( "TRACK_INDEX", &(tIndices->tTrackIndex), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
596  tTrees->tTrackTree->Branch( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tTrackFirstStep), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
597  tTrees->tTrackTree->Branch( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tTrackLastStep), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
598 
599  tTrees->tStepTree = new TTree( "STEP_DATA", "STEP_DATA" );
600  tTrees->tStepTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
601  tTrees->tStepTree->Branch( "STEP_INDEX", &(tIndices->tStepIndex), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
602 }

604 void WriteDataTrees( KRootFile *tRootFile, DataTreeVector *tOutputDataTreeVector, DataTreeVector *tDataTreeVector )
605 {
606  for( DataTreeVector::iterator tIt = tDataTreeVector->begin(); tIt != tDataTreeVector->end(); ++tIt )
607  {
608  tOutputDataTreeVector->push_back( make_pair( (*tIt).first, new TTree( (TString) (*tIt).first, (TString) (*tIt).first ) ) );
609  tOutputDataTreeVector->back().second->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
610  }
611 }

613 void WriteDataBranches( TTree *tStructureTree, TTree *tPresenceTree, TTree *tDataTree, DataMap *tDataMap, const int tBufferSize, const int tSplitSize )
614 {
615  tStructureTree->Branch( "LABEL", tDataMap->tStructureLabelPointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
616  tStructureTree->Branch( "TYPE", tDataMap->tStructureTypePointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
617 
618  tPresenceTree->Branch( "INDEX", tDataMap->tPresenceIndexPointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
619  tPresenceTree->Branch( "LENGTH", tDataMap->tPresenceLengthPointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
620 
621  for( map< string, Bool_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tBoolMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tBoolMap.end(); ++tIt )
622  {
623  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
624  }
625  for( map< string, UChar_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tUCharMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tUCharMap.end(); ++tIt )
626  {
627  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
628  }
629  for( map< string, Char_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tCharMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tCharMap.end(); ++tIt )
630  {
631  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
632  }
633  for( map< string, UShort_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tUShortMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tUShortMap.end(); ++tIt )
634  {
635  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
636  }
637  for( map< string, Short_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tShortMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tShortMap.end(); ++tIt )
638  {
639  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
640  }
641  for( map< string, UInt_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tUIntMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tUIntMap.end(); ++tIt )
642  {
643  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
644  }
645  for( map< string, Int_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tIntMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tIntMap.end(); ++tIt )
646  {
647  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
648  }
649  for( map< string, ULong64_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tULongMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tULongMap.end(); ++tIt )
650  {
651  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
652  }
653  for( map< string, Long64_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tLongMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tLongMap.end(); ++tIt )
654  {
655  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
656  }
657  for( map< string, Float_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tFloatMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tFloatMap.end(); ++tIt )
658  {
659  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
660  }
661  for( map< string, Double_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tDoubleMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tDoubleMap.end(); ++tIt )
662  {
663  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
664  }
665  for( map< string, string * >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tStringPointerMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tStringPointerMap.end(); ++tIt )
666  {
667  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
668  }
669  for( map< string, Double_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tTwoVectorXMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tTwoVectorXMap.end(); ++tIt )
670  {
671  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
672  }
673  for( map< string, Double_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tTwoVectorYMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tTwoVectorYMap.end(); ++tIt )
674  {
675  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
676  }
677  for( map< string, Double_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tThreeVectorXMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tThreeVectorXMap.end(); ++tIt )
678  {
679  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
680  }
681  for( map< string, Double_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tThreeVectorYMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tThreeVectorYMap.end(); ++tIt )
682  {
683  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
684  }
685  for( map< string, Double_t >::iterator tIt = tDataMap->tThreeVectorZMap.begin(); tIt != tDataMap->tThreeVectorZMap.end(); ++tIt )
686  {
687  tDataTree->Branch( (TString) (*tIt).first, &((*tIt).second), tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
688  }
689 }

691 void FillDataStructureBranch( TTree *tOutputStructureTree, TTree *tInputStructureTree )
692 {
693  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputStructureTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
694  {
695  tInputStructureTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
696  tOutputStructureTree->Fill();
697  }

700 void GetWriteFillKeyTrees( KRootFile *tRootFile, Trees *tInputTrees, Trees *tOutputTrees, const int tBufferSize, const int tSplitSize )
701 {
702  string tRunKey;
703  string* tRunKeyPointer = &tRunKey;
704  string** tRunKeyHandle = &tRunKeyPointer;
705 
706  string tEventKey;
707  string* tEventKeyPointer = &tEventKey;
708  string** tEventKeyHandle = &tEventKeyPointer;
709 
710  string tTrackKey;
711  string* tTrackKeyPointer = &tTrackKey;
712  string** tTrackKeyHandle = &tTrackKeyPointer;
713 
714  string tStepKey;
715  string* tStepKeyPointer = &tStepKey;
716  string** tStepKeyHandle = &tStepKeyPointer;
717 
718  tInputTrees->tRunKeysTree->SetBranchAddress( "KEY", tRunKeyHandle );
719  tInputTrees->tEventKeysTree->SetBranchAddress( "KEY", tEventKeyHandle );
720  tInputTrees->tTrackKeysTree->SetBranchAddress( "KEY", tTrackKeyHandle );
721  tInputTrees->tStepKeysTree->SetBranchAddress( "KEY", tStepKeyHandle );
722 
723  tOutputTrees->tRunKeysTree = new TTree( "RUN_KEYS", "RUN_KEYS" );
724  tOutputTrees->tRunKeysTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
725  tOutputTrees->tRunKeysTree->Branch( "KEY", tRunKeyPointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
726 
727  tOutputTrees->tEventKeysTree = new TTree( "EVENT_KEYS", "EVENT_KEYS" );
728  tOutputTrees->tEventKeysTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
729  tOutputTrees->tEventKeysTree->Branch( "KEY", tEventKeyPointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
730 
731  tOutputTrees->tTrackKeysTree = new TTree( "TRACK_KEYS", "TRACK_KEYS" );
732  tOutputTrees->tTrackKeysTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
733  tOutputTrees->tTrackKeysTree->Branch( "KEY", tTrackKeyPointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
734 
735  tOutputTrees->tStepKeysTree = new TTree( "STEP_KEYS", "STEP_KEYS" );
736  tOutputTrees->tStepKeysTree->SetDirectory( tRootFile->File() );
737  tOutputTrees->tStepKeysTree->Branch( "KEY", tStepKeyPointer, tBufferSize, tSplitSize );
738 
739  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tRunKeysTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
740  {
741  tInputTrees->tRunKeysTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
742  tOutputTrees->tRunKeysTree->Fill();
743  }
744  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tEventKeysTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
745  {
746  tInputTrees->tEventKeysTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
747  tOutputTrees->tEventKeysTree->Fill();
748  }
749  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tTrackKeysTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
750  {
751  tInputTrees->tTrackKeysTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
752  tOutputTrees->tTrackKeysTree->Fill();
753  }
754  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tStepKeysTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
755  {
756  tInputTrees->tStepKeysTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
757  tOutputTrees->tStepKeysTree->Fill();
758  }
759 }
760 
761 void FillIndexTrees( Trees *tOutputTrees, Trees *tInputTrees, Indices *tIndices )
762 {
763  unsigned int tRunEntries = tOutputTrees->tRunTree->GetEntries();
764  unsigned int tEventEntries = tOutputTrees->tEventTree->GetEntries();
765  unsigned int tTrackEntries = tOutputTrees->tTrackTree->GetEntries();
766  unsigned int tStepEntries = tOutputTrees->tStepTree->GetEntries();
767 
768  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tRunTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
769  {
770  tInputTrees->tRunTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
771 
772  (tIndices->tRunIndex) += tRunEntries;
773  (tIndices->tRunFirstEvent) += tEventEntries;
774  (tIndices->tRunLastEvent) += tEventEntries;
775  (tIndices->tRunFirstTrack) += tTrackEntries;
776  (tIndices->tRunLastTrack) += tTrackEntries;
777  (tIndices->tRunFirstStep) += tStepEntries;
778  (tIndices->tRunLastStep) += tStepEntries;
779 
780  tOutputTrees->tRunTree->Fill();
781  }
782  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tEventTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
783  {
784  tInputTrees->tEventTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
785 
786  (tIndices->tEventIndex) += tEventEntries;
787  (tIndices->tEventFirstTrack) += tTrackEntries;
788  (tIndices->tEventLastTrack) += tTrackEntries;
789  (tIndices->tEventFirstStep) += tStepEntries;
790  (tIndices->tEventLastStep) += tStepEntries;
791 
792  tOutputTrees->tEventTree->Fill();
793  }
794  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tTrackTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
795  {
796  tInputTrees->tTrackTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
797 
798  (tIndices->tTrackIndex) += tTrackEntries;
799  (tIndices->tTrackFirstStep) += tStepEntries;
800  (tIndices->tTrackLastStep) += tStepEntries;
801 
802  tOutputTrees->tTrackTree->Fill();
803  }
804  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputTrees->tStepTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
805  {
806  tInputTrees->tStepTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
807 
808  (tIndices->tStepIndex) += tStepEntries;
809 
810  tOutputTrees->tStepTree->Fill();
811  }
812 }
813 
814 void FillDataBranches( TTree *tOutputDataTree, TTree *tInputDataTree )
815 {
816  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputDataTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
817  {
818  tInputDataTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
819  tOutputDataTree->Fill();
820  }
821 }
822 
823 void FillDataPresenceBranch( TTree *tOutputDataPresenceTree, TTree *tInputDataPresenceTree, DataMap *tDataMap )
824 {
825  mainmsg( eDebug ) << "Filling presence tree"<<eom;
826 
827  unsigned int tLastEntry = 0;
828  unsigned int tLastLength = 0;
829 
830  //get the last presence index and length in the output tree, if this is not the first presence data
831  if ( tOutputDataPresenceTree->GetEntries() != 0)
832  {
833  tOutputDataPresenceTree->GetEntry( tOutputDataPresenceTree->GetEntries() - 1 );
834  tLastEntry = (tDataMap->tPresenceIndex);
835  tLastLength = (tDataMap->tPresenceLength);
836  }
837  mainmsg( eDebug ) <<"last entry is: "<<tLastEntry<<eom;
838  mainmsg( eDebug ) <<"last length is: "<<tLastLength<<eom;
839 
840  for( Int_t tIndex = 0; tIndex < tInputDataPresenceTree->GetEntries(); tIndex++ )
841  {
842  tInputDataPresenceTree->GetEntry( tIndex );
843  (tDataMap->tPresenceIndex) += ( tLastEntry + tLastLength);
844  tOutputDataPresenceTree->Fill();
845  }
846 }
